title: Social Media Specialist (High Volume & Organic Growth)
description:
Trendflow is a Performance Marketing Agency scaling fast. We help businesses dominate via paid ads. Now, we need our own organic presence (Instagram, LinkedIn, Blog) to match that level of dominance.



We are looking for a Content Producer, not a perfectionist Artist.

We prioritize speed, consistency, and volume.



This is a Part-Time Role (~20 hours/week) focused purely on content execution.



--- YOUR MISSION ---



1. Produce & Schedule: 

3-5 social posts per week (Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok).



2. Blog Engine: 

Adapt industry news/videos into blog posts (WordPress).



3. Asset Creation: 

Use Canva, AI tools (Midjourney/ChatGPT), and templates to move fast.



4. Ownership: 

You run the calendar. We don't want to micromanage you.



--- YOU ARE ---



- Fast: You can turn an idea into a post in 30 minutes, not 3 days.

- Tech-Savvy: You use AI tools to multiply your output.

- Fluent in English: Excellent written communication.

title: Project Manager
description:
About the Role



We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Project Manager to oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of projects for our clients and internal teams. The Project Manager will serve as the central point of coordination between clients, internal teams, and external collaborators, ensuring projects are completed on time, within scope, and at the highest quality standards.



This role is critical in maintaining smooth workflows, managing timelines, and ensuring client satisfaction while supporting a fast-growing digital services agency.



Key Responsibilities



Project Planning & Coordination

Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, deliverables, and resource allocation

Define project scope, goals, and deliverables in collaboration with stakeholders

Coordinate tasks between content creators, SEO specialists, designers, developers, and account managers

Track project progress and adjust schedules/resources to ensure timely delivery

Client & Stakeholder Management



Serve as the primary point of contact for clients regarding project status and updates

Facilitate regular check-ins and status meetings with internal teams and clients

Manage client expectations, scope changes, and approvals in alignment with company policies

Ensure client satisfaction by proactively identifying risks and providing solutions

Quality Assurance & Compliance



Review project outputs to ensure alignment with quality standards, branding, and client guidelines

Ensure adherence to internal SOPs, compliance, and confidentiality protocols

Identify potential issues early and escalate to relevant teams for resolution

Resource & Risk Management



Allocate resources effectively across multiple projects

Anticipate risks and bottlenecks, and implement mitigation strategies

Monitor team workloads to prevent burnout and optimize efficiency

Reporting & Documentation



Maintain detailed project documentation, status reports, and dashboards

Provide timely updates to leadership on project performance, risks, and outcomes

Capture lessons learned and recommend process improvements

Process Improvement



Identify inefficiencies and propose improvements to project workflows and SOPs

Implement project management tools and best practices to enhance team productivity

Support the onboarding and training of team members on project processes

Qualifications



Proven experience as a Project Manager in a digital, SEO, content, or marketing environment

Strong understanding of project management methodologies (Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall)

Excellent communication, organizational, and time-management skills

Proficiency with project management tools (Asana, ClickUp, Trello, Jira, Notion, etc.)

Ability to handle multiple projects and priorities simultaneously

Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities

Knowledge of SEO, content publishing, and digital marketing workflows is a plus

Key Competencies



Leadership and team coordination

Client-facing professionalism

Attention to detail and quality control

Proactive and solution-oriented mindset

Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, remote, or hybrid work environment

What We Offer



Opportunity to work with a fast-growing, innovative digital services company

Remote-friendly environment with flexible working hours

Exposure to diverse projects and clients in the digital space

Collaborative team culture and professional growth opportunities

title: YouTube Video Editor (Long-form)
description:
[Work Type]

Remote | Flexible Hours | Long-term Contract

You may choose either Part-time(+3hrs/day) or Full-time



[Caution]

You’ll be using plugins in After Effects for motion and transitions, so please continue only if you’re already comfortable and experienced working in After Effects.



[Salary]

-$100 per project

-$300 USD commitment bonus after completing 10 projects (you will be paid $100+$300 for every 10th project you complete)

-You don't have to search for the visual elements such as video clips, images, talking-heads since all the elements will be provided.

-I can provide 1~2 projects each week as long as you can manage (our current editor says he can consistently handle around 1.5–2 projects per week after being fully aligned with the workflow and preferred style).

-Expect the first project will take longer as we need to adjust to the desired working style. But as we get on to the 2nd, 3rd, ... it will take less time as there will be less corrections to make.



[What You’ll Do]

IMPORTANT-> Here's a sample video(you must watch it before applying): 

-All the ingredients(images, video clips, voice-over, talking-head, BGM and script) for the video will be provided.

-You will select images that best match the context from the provided asset folder, place them at the appropriate timestamps, and add motion, transitions, sound effects, and background music.

-Use After Effect plugins such as Mister Horse and Flow to add dynamic motions.

-The images or video clips must match with what's being spoken by the voice-over.

-Collaborate with me or our team to ensure the visuals meet aesthetic and desired output.



*In the beginning, your edits will get a few rounds of feedback for refinement while adjusting to the preferred video style. But as you're aligned and become familiar, you won't need my feedback and refinement as much.



[What We’re Looking For]

The ideal candidate:

-Communicates effectively and values mutual respect.

-Has a creative editing skill for visually appealing videos; to avoid viewer's boredom.

-Has strong time management skills to meet deadlines.

-Is accountable and committed to the role.



*Important Note:

We value respectful communication. What does it mean?

Most importantly, if you need to step away, just let me or your manager know why and when. We understand it, even if you need to leave tomorrow, BUT ghosting is the last thing you'd like to do, since it causes confusion and delays. 

In everyday conversations, our team thrives on mutual respect, no matter your role.



[Why Work With Us?]

-Flexible hours to suit your schedule. (You’re welcome to work at night and submit your draft. While you’re asleep, it will be reviewed and feedback will be ready within 12 hours.)

-Long-term growth opportunities as the channel expands.

-A supportive environment that values creativity and contributions.



[About Us]

We help YouTube creators master storytelling techniques to captivate audiences and achieve viral success. Your role will play a key part in bringing our vision to life and empowering creators worldwide.



[How to Apply]

Subject Line: Start your title with “VIDEO EDIT”, or your application can't be considered.



In your application, include:

1. Portfolio: Share 2-3 of your best projects involving video editing with motion graphic.

2. Work History: Explain any experience or projects involving motion graphics or After Effects.

3. After Effects Skill: Please rate your After Effects skill level on a 5-star scale.

4. Available Hours: Let us know when you are available for our work each day of the week(For example:Monday: 11:00AM - 2:00PM, Tuesday: 3:30PM - 8:00PM, Wednesday: ..., etc)

5. Available Period of Work: Let us know for how long you expect to work with this job. We'd prefer at least 3 months with additional projects forward.

6. Whether or not you're willing to be on a Zoo
eting: We prefer Zoo
eting because this shows your accountability as well as it drives our team to the same goal together.



I will respond to your application in 7 days all at once.

title: [task] Looking for an AI-First
description:
Title: Looking for an AI-First "Vibe Coder" to help me build web apps

I’m currently working on a few new web apps and I’m using AI to do most of the heavy lifting. I’ve already got the plans and the logic figured out, but I need some help actually putting the pieces together and making sure everything works the way it should.

How we’ll work together:

I’m the "Architect"—I’ll give you the vision, the rules, and the prompts. You’ll be the one actually sitting in the cockpit, managing the AI as it builds out the features.

This isn't about you writing code from scratch. It’s about you being the "Pilot." You’ll oversee the plan the AI comes up with, test what it builds, and if it’s being a bit slow or making mistakes, you’ll be the one to steer it back on track. Once you’re happy that a feature works exactly how we planned, you’ll show it to me so we can move on to the next piece of the puzzle. We'll be using specific tools like Google Antigravity and Clawdbot, but the AI will help you navigate those.

What I’m looking for:

You don't need a computer science degree, but you do need to be someone who is comfortable with tech and knows how to talk to an AI to get what they want. If the AI gets stuck, I’m always here to jump in and help you troubleshoot, but I’m looking for someone who catches on quickly so we don't have to solve the same problem twice.

The Deal:

I’m looking to start this as a weekly relationship. We’ll start at $50 per week, but I’m flexible. As we get more comfortable working together and the projects start coming to life, we can definitely talk about adjusting that. I’m not interested in tracking your every minute; I care about us building cool things and making steady progress.

Interested?

Send me a message and tell me a bit about why this "vibe coding" style of building appeals to you.

Just to make sure you’ve got a handle on the basic tools we’ll be using: if I asked you to set up a
 bot as part of one of our apps, what’s the name of the "Bot" inside
 you have to message to get your API key?





Just to check that you have read it till end, you can find more info about job and faster way to contact via 
 PS: I dont have a pro account

title: Web and Marketing Designer
description:
Job Description: Web + Marketing Designer (Wix Studio, Canva, Figma)



If you love turning messy notes into clean, on-brand pages… and you get weirdly excited about a well-structured resource hub (like “ah yes, hierarchy ????”), this might be your lane.



We’re looking for a Web + Marketing Designer who can help us ship a backlog of website pages and marketing assets fast—without needing constant approvals. This isn’t a “just make pretty things” role. It’s a take-ownership, ship consistently, and make the brand feel instantly more professional kind of role.



?



Your impact



Within 90 days, you’ll own a steady pipeline of polished web and marketing assets. You’ll help us:

 • launch a content/resource hub with 20–25 high-quality pages

 • create clean, consistent marketing + client education materials

 • speed up how we communicate with clients (clearer visuals, better pages, smoother onboarding)



?



What you’ll do



Website build-outs (core focus)

 • Build and refresh 20–25 website pages to kickstart a content/resource hub (feature launches, SOP-style guides, education pages)

 • Work mainly in Wix Studio (if you’re strong in WordPress/CMS and can ramp fast, that’s totally acceptable)

 • Turn rough wireframes/notes into polished pages with strong layout, hierarchy, and readability

 • Make smart design decisions independently (no “waiting for the founder to approve every pixel” energy)



Marketing + client-education assets

 • Create branded assets in Canva (LinkedIn carousel/swipe posts, onboarding visuals, lightweight collateral)

 • Maintain brand consistency using our brand kit (fonts, colours, spacing, tone)

 • Produce Figma mockups when needed (page concepts, component ideas, layout explorations) and translate them into live pages



Light ops + communication support (small but helpful)

 • Support basic operations:
 triage, draft/reply to simple messages, flag priority items

 • Gradually step into client onboarding/follow-ups once you understand the business (you may be looped into onboarding comms or occasional calls)



How we collaborate

 • Daily comms:

 • Files/docs: Google Workspace

 • Documentation: Confluence (easy to learn)



?



Must-have qualifications (self-check)

 • Formal design education (degree, diploma, or recognised certification) — not purely self-taught

 • Strong portfolio showing web + marketing design (live links and/or case studies)

 • Confident in Canva (independent creation of marketing assets)

 • Confident in Figma (UI/UX mockups, layouts, components)

 • Web platform capability: Wix Studio preferred, or strong WordPress/CMS experience and can ramp quickly

 • Professional, client-ready English (written + spoken)

 • Comfortable working with autonomy and initiative (minimal hand-holding)

 • Secure home office + reliable internet



?



Nice to have (but not required)

 • Wix Studio experience specifically (responsive rules, components, Studio builder)

 • Experience designing education/resource hubs, knowledge bases, or feature launch pages

 • Basic copywriting / UX writing instincts

 • Confluence familiarity or experience documenting workflows

 • Comfortable using AI tools to speed up drafts (with good judgment)



?



Success outcomes (30 / 60 / 90 days)



30 days — settled in + shipping

 • Learn the brand + cadence

 • Ship your first pages/assets with minimal revisions

 • Establish a weekly rhythm (plan early-week, deliver end-week)



60 days — consistent output

 • Reliably produce high-quality pages and Canva assets end-to-end

 • Confidently handle simple client follow-ups/onboarding comms



90 days — pipeline owner

 • Own the web + marketing design pipeline

 • Clear the initial backlog of pages

 • Reduce founder involvement to quick reviews vs constant direction



?



Why this role matters



The business is growing and shipping features, but design + content updates are bottlenecked by founder capacity. Your work directly improves:

 • how customers understand the product

 • how polished the brand looks

 • how smooth onboarding feels



If you want a role that starts design-heavy and can grow into broader ops/client support, you’ll fit here.

title: E-commerce Video Editor (Remote) - Performance Bonuses + Profit Sharing
description:
E-commerce Video Editor (Remote) - Performance Bonuses + Profit Sharing



---



---



Who We Are



I'm Bob. I built and scaled an e-commerce brand to a team of over 20 people, then sold it and now I'm building my next brand, and I'm looking for the right people to build it with me.



The brand is in the beauty and supplement space, targeting the Scandinavian market. The ambition is to build one of the largest brands in this space in Scandinavia.



But I'm doing it differently this time.



Instead of building a big team, I'm building a small group of highly talented people who want to grow together. People who care about quality over quantity. People who want to share in the profits of what we build.



The goal: a tight team building a brand doing at least $100,000 profit per month, with profit sharing for the people who helped create it.



Over the past year, I taught myself how to code using AI tools and built our own software from scratch. It handles research, performance tracking, and the creative process. Still evolving, but the foundation is there. I'm telling you this because this is the mindset I want from everyone on the team. Always learning. Always improving.



---



The Role



We're looking for a video editor to join as one of the first team members.



Your job is to bring scripts to life. We put serious effort into research and writing strong scripts. Your role is to turn those scripts into visuals that tell the story perfectly. Every scene, every cut, every visual choice should match what's being said. You're not just editing video. You're the storytelling of the brand.



We're not trying to mass produce ads. Our target is a win rate of over 50%. Fewer ads that actually win, not volume for the sake of volume.



Here's what the role actually looks like:



Creating ads for products (such as supplements and red light) that help women 40+ feel comfortable with the changes in their bodies. UGC-style ads, VSLs, and other formats for paid social. You'll work closely with me and my co-founder (both creative strategists) with each video you create.



Using AI video generation and real UGC content together. We'll work with real creators, but AI is a huge part of where things are going. We'll provide tools and courses (Runway, HeyGen, Flow from google ai studio, and others), but we want someone who explores on their own too.



Studying what's working. Looking at what other brands are doing, what kind of ads are performing, and bringing insights back to the team.



Keeping things organized. Using our content library, organizing footage, making it easier for the team to create better work over time.



Being okay with the startup reality. Some days you might need to create something outside your core role. That's how it works when building something from scratch.



---



What We're Looking For



Strong video editing skills. You know how to tell a story and keep people engaged throughout the entire video. Experience with Premiere Pro, Final Cut, CapCut, or similar.



Someone who understands that every visual choice matters. The right clip, the right timing, the storytelling that keeps people watching.



A learning mindset. You want to get better every day. You're excited about AI tools. You don't wait to be told what to learn.



Someone who contributes, not just executes. You bring ideas to the table. You share what you've learned. You come prepared to weekly team meetings with insights and suggestions.



Organized. You keep your files, footage, and projects structured so the team can work efficiently together.



E-commerce experience is a plus. If you've created UGC or VSL content before, great. If not but you're hungry to learn, we can teach you.



---



What We Offer



Base salary: $800-2000 USD per month depending on experience.



Performance bonuses. When your ads hit certain thresholds, you earn more.



Profit sharing as the brand grows. The people who build the brand should share in the profits.



A team that actually works together. Weekly meetings where everyone shows up, shares what they've learned, looks at what's working for us and for other brands, and brainstorms ideas to test. This isn't a job where you work alone and submit tasks. We learn and grow together.



Personal training and development. You'll work closely with me and my co-founder. Courses on AI video creation, breakdowns of winning ads, real feedback on your work.



Access to tools. AI video generation tools, our internal software, whatever you need to do great work.



Room to grow. As the brand scales, so does the team. The people here from the beginning will lead that growth.



Full remote. Work from anywhere. Available 8am-5pm CET, Monday through Friday.



---



This Isn't for Everyone



This is a startup. Things are still being built. The software is evolving, the processes are evolving, and there will be things we figure out together.



If you see that as exciting, if you want to be part of a small team building something big, and if you want to grow into a leader as the brand grows, I'd love to hear from you.



---



How to Apply



Include in your application:



- Your portfolio (best UGC/VSL work or other video editing that shows your skills)

- Your resume/CV

- A brief message explaining why this opportunity interests you

- Important: Include the word "Paxa" at the top of your application so we know you read the full post



We review applications quickly and will get back to qualified candidates within 48 hours.

title: Video Editor
description:
Job Description

We are seeking a proactive, organised, and reliable Video Editor to join our growing property development and investment business. This role is pivotal to how we communicate, build trust, and maintain momentum across our platforms, while also offering the opportunity to contribute to a purpose beyond the business.



As part of your responsibilities, you will primarily support Syntix Properties by reviewing footage, editing short- and long-form content in line with brand guidelines and the content schedule, creating thumbnails, preparing content for weekly review meetings, and scheduling and posting across TikTok, Meta, YouTube, and LinkedIn. You will also monitor trends, support the creation and performance tracking of ads, and report insights and recommendations to the wider team.



In addition to supporting the property business, you will occasionally edit and produce footage for NXT-GEN, helping to communicate Kingdom-focused messages and support the spreading of the gospel through high-quality, engaging content.



This is a purpose-driven role suited to someone who is creative, consistent, and dependable, with a strong eye for detail and a passion for using their editing skills to support both business growth and Kingdom impact.



Why This Role is Crucial

The role of Video Editor within our organisation is both strategic and highly valued. It sits at the heart of how Syntix Properties is seen, understood, and trusted by the market. By transforming raw footage and updates into clear, high-quality content, you help communicate our ethos of transparency, integrity, and excellence, while keeping our audience consistently informed and engaged.



Your work is crucial because our content directly supports the core drivers of the business: ABS/ABR, relationship building, and investor confidence. Every reel, long-form video, thumbnail, and post is an opportunity to show who we are, what we do, and how we operate, turning our projects, knowledge, and personal stories into a repeatable system that attracts deals, partners, and investors. When the content is consistent, on-brand, and delivered on schedule, it maintains momentum, strengthens credibility, and helps the wider team execute business objectives effectively.



What sets this role apart is its dual focus. While your primary output supports the property development business, you will also occasionally edit and produce footage for NXT-GEN. This aspect of the role allows you to use your creative skillset to support a Kingdom-focused mission, helping to communicate messages that contribute to the spreading of the gospel and creating lasting spiritual impact.



In this capacity, you enable leaders and the wider team to stay focused on high-level priorities, confident that our message is being delivered with clarity and professionalism across TikTok, Meta, YouTube, and LinkedIn. Your contribution plays a direct role in building trust, expanding our network, and supporting sustainable growth, ensuring that the standard of our public output matches the standard we uphold in our work, and supporting a purpose that goes beyond profit.



Property Development Business Support (50%) + Christian Organisation Support (50%)



Content Intake: Review raw content uploaded to Dropbox and confirm files are complete, usable, and labelled correctly.

Editing (Short + Long Form): Edit videos into short- and long-form formats in line with brand guidelines and the content schedule.

Thumbnails: Create and upload thumbnails for both short- and long-form content, consistent with brand identity.

Review Meeting Prep: Ensure all content is edited and ready for the “Schedule Content Review” meeting.

Scheduling & Posting: Schedule and post content across TikTok, Meta, YouTube, and LinkedIn, ensuring correct captions, hashtags, and timings.

Trend Monitoring: Assess trends across platforms and communicate relevant insights and opportunities to the team.

Paid Ads: Create, run, and monitor ads across platforms, adjusting creatives and targeting as needed.

Performance Reporting: Review performance of content, posts, and ads; gather data and provide recommendations to the wider team.



Benefits of the Role

Competitive Salary: A strong base salary reflective of your experience, skills, and the value you bring to both our business and ministry operations.

Performance-Based Bonuses: Receive a bonus for every successful property acquisition, rewarding your direct contribution to the growth and success of the company.

Team with Vision: Work alongside individuals who are passionate, focused, and aligned around a clear, purpose-driven vision.

Opportunity to transition into full-time



About Syntix Properties 

Syntix Properties is a dynamic property development company with a passion for breathing new life into tired and overlooked buildings. We specialise in turning neglected buildings into modern, affordable living spaces that meet the needs of today’s tenants. We aim to make property investment accessible and rewarding, while delivering high-quality, life-changing homes in partnership with trusted investors. We operate with transparency, integrity, and excellence in everything we build and manage.



Our Expectation: 

As a Video Editor within our organisation, you will be expected to embody and uphold the core values that define our culture and guide our work. We are committed to excellence in all that we do, and we seek team members who reflect that same standard. The following expectations are central to your success in this role:

Pursuit of Excellence: Approach every edit, thumbnail, caption, post, and ad creative big or small,  with a mindset of excellence. We value individuals who are proactive, detail-oriented, and committed to producing high-quality content that reflects the professionalism of our organisation.

Client-Focused Mindset: Whether creating content for investors, partners, prospective clients, ministry audiences, or internal stakeholders, you are expected to maintain a service-oriented approach that prioritises the needs of those we serve and communicates clearly and responsibly.

Integrity and Transparency: Act with honesty and integrity at all times. We believe in accurate representation of our work, open communication, clear reporting on performance, and ethical conduct as the foundation for trust across both business and ministry content.

Responsiveness and Reliability: Be timely and dependable in all communications and commitments. Prompt turnaround on revisions, consistent delivery against the content schedule, and reliable posting are key to maintaining momentum and strong relationships across both areas of your work.

Ownership and Accountability: Take full responsibility for the end-to-end content pipeline from reviewing raw footage to delivering final edits, scheduling posts, and reporting performance, demonstrating initiative and follow-through with minimal supervision.

Mission-Driven Alignment: Recognise the significance of your role in both business and ministry contexts. We expect a genuine commitment to the dual nature of this role, supporting commercial growth through consistent, high-quality content while occasionally contributing to NXT-GEN and the advancement of our Christian mission.





Required Skills

Video Editing Expertise: Advanced ability to edit short- and long-form content to a high standard (pacing, storytelling, sound design, captions, colour correction, graphics) with a strong understanding of platform-first editing.

Platform Knowledge (Growth Focused): Deep understanding of what performs on TikTok, Instagram/Meta, YouTube (shorts + long-form) and LinkedIn, including hooks, retention, watch time, formats, and audience behaviour.

Content Strategy & Repurposing: Ability to turn raw footage into multiple high-performing assets (reels/shorts, long-form, clips, teasers) while staying aligned with brand guidelines and content schedule.

Thumbnail & Creative Design: Strong skills in designing high-converting thumbnails and on-screen graphics that match brand identity and improve click-through rates.

Time Management & Delivery Excellence: Proven ability to hit deadlines consistently, manage multiple edits at once, and deliver content ready for review ahead of the “Schedule Content Review” meeting.

Attention to Detail & Brand Consistency: Strong eye for detail to ensure every edit, caption, visual, and post aligns with the company’s brand identity, tone, and standards of excellence.

Analytics & Performance Reporting: Ability to review performance of posts and ads, interpret data (retention, CTR, engagement, conversions), and provide clear recommendations to improve results.

Innovation & Trend Awareness: Proactive in identifying trends, formats, and creative angles across platforms, testing new ideas, and sharing insights that drive growth and engagement.

Ad Creative & Optimization: Confident in creating, running, and monitoring paid ads, including iterating creatives based on performance and communicating results to the team.

Technical Proficiency: Comfortable with professional editing tools (e.g., CapCut), motion graphics basics, file management, exporting specs, and working with Dropbox and scheduling tools.

Communication & Collaboration: Clear, professional communication with the team; able to receive feedback well, ask the right questions, and implement revisions quickly.

Reliability & Ownership: Takes full ownership of the content pipeline from footage review to final delivery, scheduling, and performance review without needing constant follow-up.

Team Fit & Professionalism: Positive, solutions-focused attitude; respectful, adaptable, and able to work well within a fast-moving team environment.

Alignment with Mission: Supportive of the company’s values and comfortable occasionally producing content for NXT-GEN that contributes to Kingdom-focused work and the spreading of the gospel.

Values: Aligns with the vision and mission of the business, demonstrating integrity, professionalism, and a commitment to excellence.

title: Telemarketer
description:
I’m hiring a phone dialer / appointment setter to make outbound calls to people who have already joined my online community.



This is NOT cold sales.

You are calling warm leads to:



Qualify them



Extract their real problem



Shift their thinking



Book qualified calls on my calendar



If you rely on scripts, sound timid on the phone, or struggle with real conversations — do not apply.



What You’ll Be Doing:



Making outbound calls to warm leads (US & Canada)



Following a clear call framework (training provided)



Asking direct questions to uncover real objections



Challenging weak logic respectfully



Booking same-day appointments when qualified



Taking notes after each call



What I’m Looking For:



Confident English speaker (neutral or US/UK accent preferred)



Comfortable leading conversations



Can speak with conviction (not robotic, not scripted)



Can think logically under pressure



Not afraid of silence or pushback



Reliable internet + quiet environment



This Is NOT For You If:



You need word-for-word scripts



You’re afraid to challenge prospects



You sound unsure or apologetic on calls



You want an “easy” job



You avoid uncomfortable conversations



Training & Support:



You’ll receive detailed SOPs



Live call examples



Roleplay breakdowns



Ongoing feedback to improve performance



Pay:



Paid per hour or per booking (to be discussed)



Long-term work available for the right person



To Apply (Required):



Briefly explain your phone experience



Send a voice note introducing yourself (mandatory)



Tell me why you’re confident on the phone



Applications without a voice note will be ignored.



If you’re sharp, confident, and want to level up your communication skills while getting paid — apply.

title: Shopify Brand Designer & Storytelling Strategist
description:
TYPE OF EMPLOYMENT



Contract / Freelance (Open to Long-Term)



JOB DESCRIPTION



I’m looking for a skilled Shopify professional who understands brand storytelling, visual identity, and symbolic messaging, not just surface-level design.



Allegedly Enlighten is a clothing brand built around a core truth:

Reality is layered. Identity is constructed. We exist inside illusion, samsara, and systems that shape perception (what many would call “the matrix”).



This brand is not about preaching or explaining everything explicitly.

The people who get it will recognize the message immediately.

Everyone else will simply see mystical, symbolic, and visually striking designs that feel meaningful even if they can’t fully explain why.



Your role will be to rebuild the brand image and Shopify store so it tells a cohesive, honest story through:



Visual hierarchy



Layout and flow



Copy tone



Symbolism and subtle narrative cues



Key Responsibilities



Rebuild and refine the Shopify storefront (design + structure)



Develop a cohesive brand aesthetic that feels mystical, grounded, and intentional



Help translate abstract philosophical ideas into clean, wearable branding



Improve product page storytelling (without over-explaining)



Ensure the site feels premium, intentional, and emotionally resonant



Optimize for clarity, flow, and conversion without losing meaning



What I’m Looking For



Strong Shopify experience (themes, layout, UX)



A good eye for symbolism, minimalism, and narrative-driven design



Comfort working with philosophical, spiritual, or metaphysical concepts



Someone who understands that less explanation often creates more impact



Ability to collaborate and interpret vision, not just follow instructions



This is not a generic streetwear brand.

This is a signal.

title: Full-Time Funnel Expert
description:
About Us

We are a global tech company building the first DeFi bank for companies and individuals.

For the first time in history since the invention of banking, customers – not banks – can have full ownership of their money.

. Thanks to our proprietary multi-signature and decentralized technology, companies can work internationally with no risk of payment delays, and at a fraction of the cost of legacy banks.

. Workers can remit funds to their loved ones at almost no cost.

. And two billion unbanked can become financially independent.

We are not just building the future of finance. We can make a real difference.

We have validated the vision and secured the capital from both recurring revenues and a seed round. Now, we are leveling up our leadership.



Why Your Role Matters

As our Funnel Expert, you are the engine behind turning interest into action. You will work directly with one of the top funnel experts in the region, one of our founders, who has successfully created funnels generating billions of dollars in sales. Your support is essential to maximize his time and execute his strategies (and boost your personal knowledge in the process).



Unique Benefit

You will work directly with one of the founders, one of the top funnel experts in the region, who has generated billions of dollars in sales and has made multiple exits. This level of mentorship and exposure is rare and a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.



Key Responsibilities

- Design and optimize end-to-end user funnels — from awareness to conversion and retention.

- Conduct deep funnel analysis using quantitative and qualitative data.

- Run experiments to improve conversion rates and remove friction points.

- Implement and refine tracking, analytics, and instrumentation for funnel metrics.

- Collaborate with Growth, Product, Marketing, and Data teams to align funnel strategies.

- Identify bottlenecks and recommend data-backed improvements.

- Continuously measure and report on funnel performance and outcomes.



Skills & Experience

- Proven experience optimizing user funnels in digital products.

- Strong analytical skills and hands-on experience with data and analytics tools (Mixpanel, GA4, Amplitude, etc.)

- Track record of driving measurable improvements in conversion and engagement.

- Comfortable collaborating with cross-functional teams.

- Practical, execution-focused mindset and love for experimenting.



Salary:

 $1,000-$1,500 per month



To Apply:

Please reply to this job ad with "Funnel Expert_[Full Name]"



*Only applicants who follow these instructions will receive a screening form to complete.

title: Media Operations Manager
description:
AVIA Media Group is a fast-moving real estate media company in Las Vegas, Nevada. We’re hiring a Media Operations Manager to own the daily operational details that keep our deliveries clean, consistent, and on time.



This is a role for someone who is disciplined, obsessively detail-oriented, and naturally operates with an ownership mentality - you notice problems before they become problems, you keep standards high, and you take pride in getting it right.



What you’ll be responsible for day to day (we’ll train you on our exact workflows)

 • Photo QA/QC + delivery: verify counts, sequencing, consistency, and polish before sending to clients

 • Minor photo corrections + revision coordination with our retouching team

 • Asset handling: floor plans, Zillow 3D links, virtual staging QA and delivery

 • Social posting: publish daily content (IG/TikTok/FB/Shorts), add IG collaborators, confirm posts are live, flag missing info before posting

 • Drone compliance checks: airspace review, documentation, and team notifications



What we care about most

 • Extreme attention to detail (you catch issues others miss)

 • Reliability + consistency (you execute the same high standard every day)

 • Ownership mentality (you don’t wait to be told - if you see it, you solve it)

 • Clear written communication and comfort following SOPs



Big bonus if you have (not required)

 • Photo retouching and/or real estate photo QA/QC experience

 • Graphic design ability (clean, modern social assets)

 • Proven experience growing social accounts with strong execution and consistency

 • Go High Level CRM experience (huge plus)



Requirements

 • Stable internet (50+ Mbps upload)

 • Quiet, distraction-free work setup

 • Able to work Monday–Friday, 6:00 AM–2:30 PM PST (includes 30-minute unpaid meal break)

title: Crypto Support Call Supervisor
description:
WHO WE ARE

Yieldschool is a crypto investment consultancy serving high-net-worth individuals. We help investors intelligently capture returns across the full spectrum of permissionless onchain markets. We are three years old, with a proven record of outsized results and premium service. Our speed to $10M revenue places us in the top 0.3% of private companies. Our culture is disciplined, high-performance, and designed to deliver deep, measurable value to every customer.



OUR MISSION

To be the global standard for onchain wealth strategies. We implement non-custodial strategies across the full scope onchain economy. We need an A-player to lead our CSM team and customer journey, ensuring Members receive elite execution, renew, and expand their engagements with us.



THE ROLE

We are a crypto-native consultancy organization that helps clients manage their portfolios, execute onchain transactions, and discover yield opportunities across DeFi platforms and exchanges.



Our support team regularly assists members on live 1:1 calls to help them accomplish crypto-related tasks such as wallet setup, transactions, platform usage, and onchain actions. Support Call Supervisors are added to these calls to observe and monitor them in real time, ensuring everything is handled properly and according to our internal standards.





Responsibilities

- Join and monitor live 1:1 support calls in real time

- Ensure agents follow established procedures and security standards

- Observe call flow and step in when necessary to clarify rules or correct issues

- Flag, document, and report any process, quality, or compliance concerns



Requirements

- Deep understanding of crypto wallets, transactions, DeFi platforms, exchanges, and common onchain workflows

- High attention to detail and ability to spot subtle inconsistencies or red flags

- Fluent, professional English (spoken and written)

- Comfortable enforcing rules and maintaining standards

- Strong sense of responsibility when overseeing customer interactions

- Clean professional background



Nice to Have

- Experience in compliance, QA, risk, or operationsExperience in customer support quality assurance



Schedule & Pay

- Working in EST time: 10 AM–4 PM or 4 PM–10 PM (may include weekends)Monthly pay: $1,000 base with up to a 20% performance bonus





APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

To apply, please send your application to: 
 (remove the spaces)



Important: Along with your CV or cover letter, please record a short Loom video (2–3 minutes) introducing yourself and explaining why you are a good fit for this role.



Please note: Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be considered.

title: Documentation & SOP Specialist
description:
WHO YOU ARE

You’re organized, clear, and love bringing structure to chaos. You can look at messy notes or a complicated workflow and turn it into a simple, step-by-step guide that anyone can follow. People rely on you because you write things clearly, check your work carefully, and keep everything in order.





You enjoy figuring out how things work and making sure they’re written down the right way. You’re the kind of person who spots missing steps, fixes unclear parts, and likes keeping documents tidy and easy to use.





You’re comfortable talking to teammates, learning how they do things, and turning that into well-written SOPs. You know your way around Google Docs, Drive, and ClickUp. You don’t need to be a crypto expert, but you can learn quickly and follow the basics.





Most of all, you like helping teams work better by making their systems clear, easy to find, and easy to follow.





If this sounds like you, keep reading.





ABOUT US

Yieldschool specializes in onboarding and educating HNWI into Decentralized Finance (DeFi), also known as the Primary Crypto Markets. We guide our Members to securely access these markets and invest in quality crypto assets at earlier, cheaper stages, leveraging a proven system that has delivered significant results. Over 1,000 Members have used our system, with some achieving 500%, 1,000%, and even 3,000%+ gains in the past 12 months. We believe that DeFi is the future, and today’s decentralized infrastructure presents an unparalleled opportunity for early adopters to gain a competitive edge. Our strategic, long-term approach is focused on real value, steering away from speculation and 
 coins, and enabling investors to participate in the evolution of web3 technology.





Our founder, Frank Hepworth, is a Licensed Regulatory Financial Attorney who has worked at one of Canada’s top law firms. He’s consulted crypto exchanges on which assets they could legally list, written their policies and procedures, and negotiated with the government on their behalf. His work has contributed to the approval of the first crypto ETFs listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.





Our team is made up of top-tier professionals with deep expertise across law, engineering, traditional finance, and crypto markets. We’ve brought together sharp thinkers and high-performers who could be leading anywhere, but chose to build here. What unites us is a shared obsession with DeFi, a commitment to long-term thinking, and a drive to help others win in a space that’s still wildly misunderstood. As we scale, we’re looking for people who match that energy and want to build alongside others operating at a high level.





ABOUT THE ROLE

We’re hiring a Documentation & SOP Specialist to help us organize and write the systems that keep our company running smoothly.





You’ll work with different departments — Marketing, Sales, Fulfillment, and Operations — to write simple and clear SOPs for how things are done. Your goal is to make sure that every process is written, easy to follow, and stored in the right place.





You’ll help us build one organized library of SOPs inside ClickUp and Google Drive. You’ll make sure everything looks consistent, links work, and everyone knows where to find what they need.

This role is perfect for someone who likes clear writing, clean structure, and improving how teams work day to day.





KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

- Create clear and simple SOPs for different teams using our standard format.

- Work with tea
mbers to learn how a task is done, then write it step-by-step.

- Keep the Master SOP List in ClickUp up to date with the right tags, folders, and links.

- Make sure all SOPs follow the same layout and style.

- Keep Google Docs, Sheets, and links organized, labeled, and easy to access.

- Update SOPs when something changes and track version dates.

- Remove or archive old or duplicate documents.

- Help build starter SOP packs for new hires.

- Report on what’s complete, what’s missing, and what needs updating.

- Suggest better ways to write or organize information when you see them.





REQUIREMENTS

- Excellent written English — clear, simple, and error-free.

- Very comfortable using Google Docs, Drive, and ClickUp.

- Good at organizing folders, naming files, and managing versions.

- Can interview tea
mbers and turn what they say into easy-to-read steps.

- Pays close attention to detail and catches small mistakes.

- Fast to respond, takes ownership, and follows through on deadlines.

- Nice to have: experience with HubSpot, Loom, or crypto/web3 topics.





COMPENSATION

- $2,000–$3,000 USD/month, depending on experience.

- Performance bonus based on accuracy, speed, and adoption of SOPs.





FIRST 90 DAYS — SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE

- A full SOP template and style guide used by all departments.

- The Master SOP List in ClickUp is organized, linked, and labeled correctly.

- At least 80% of core processes are documented and reviewed.

- SOPs are updated quickly

- All documents are reviewed, dated, and free of broken links.





HOW TO APPLY

 your application to 
 with the subject line:

“[YOUR NAME] – Documentation & SOP Specialist - LinkedIn”



Include:

Your CV and LinkedIn profile.

1–2 examples of SOPs or guides you’ve written (screenshots are fine).

A short loom video answering this three questions:



1. A time you turned a messy process into a clear document.

2. How you make sure your writing is easy to follow.

3. How you’d organize a full SOP library using ClickUp and Google Drive.





FAILURE TO FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN DISQUALIFICATION WITHOUT NOTICE.

title: Operations Manager – n8n Automation & AI Systems (Vapi)
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION



We are hiring a Junior Operations Manager to support and maintain our automation and AI-driven operational systems.



This is a hands-on, execution-focused role. You will work closely with senior operators and take ownership of day-to-day automation tasks, monitoring systems, fixing issues, and gradually building more complex workflows.



This role is ideal for someone early in their operations or automation career who already has real experience using n8n and wants to deepen their skills in production systems.



WHAT YOU’LL DO



* Maintain and improve existing n8n workflows

* Build simple to moderate automation workflows under guidance

* Monitor automations and identify errors, failures, or data issues

* Help manage lead flow, list quality, and outbound logic

* Support AI calling systems and ensure clean inputs and outputs

* Assist with CRM updates, data syncing, and reporting

* Document processes and workflows as they evolve



WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE



* Automations run reliably with fewer errors

* Issues are identified early and resolved quickly

* Lead and data flow remain clean and consistent

* Senior operators spend less time on manual fixes

* You steadily take on more ownership over time



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



* Hands-on experience with n8n (required)

* Basic understanding of automation concepts (triggers, webhooks, APIs)

* Experience working with CRMs or lead generation systems

* Strong attention to detail and willingness to learn

* Comfortable following existing systems and improving them



NICE TO HAVE



* Experience with AI tools used in business operations

* Familiarity with outbound lead generation

* Experience with tools like HubSpot, Close, Apollo, Zapier, or Make



IMPORTANT

This is a hands-on role. If you have not personally built or modified n8n workflows, this role will not be a good fit.

title: Executive Assistant to the CEO (Long-Term, Full-Time)
description:
We are looking for a highly proactive, trustworthy, and service-minded Executive Assistant to support our CEO and help run both business and life with excellence.



This is not a typical assistant role. We are searching for someone who thinks ahead, protects time, handles details without reminders, and genuinely cares about doing things well. If you take pride in being dependable, organized, positive, and proactive — this role may be for you.



About the Role

As Executive Assistant to the CEO, you will act as a buffer, organizer, and strategic support partner. Your mission is to make sure nothing falls through the cracks and that the CEO’s time, energy, and focus are protected.

You should be someone who:

• Anticipates needs before being asked

• Handles tasks completely and independently

• Communicates clearly and attentively

• Takes ownership and follows through

• Brings a calm, positive, and service?oriented attitude



You should be so organized that reminders are rarely needed.

Responsibilities

• Executive calendar,
, and task management

• Acting as a buffer and gatekeeper for the CEO

• Tracking tasks, deadlines, and follow?ups without reminders

• Organizing documents, systems, and workflows

• Handling personal and business?related tasks with discretion

• Helping build and manage the CEO’s personal brand on social media

• Assisting with content coordination, scheduling, and posting

• Supporting automation workflows (Zapier or similar tools)

• Communicating with internal and external stakeholders professionally

• Identifying opportunities to improve efficiency and systems



Required Qualifications

• Proven experience working directly for a CEO or senior executive

• Extremely organized and detail?oriented

• Proactive — you see what needs to be done and do it

• High level of integrity, trustworthiness, and confidentiality

• Strong written and verbal English communication skills

• Tech?savvy and comfortable learning new tools

• Experience with Zapier or other automations (or strong willingness to learn)

• Familiarity with social media platforms (especially for personal and business branding)



Our Values

We are deeply committed to:

• Positivity

• Initiative

• Dependability

• Attentive communication

• Service?mindedness



We are looking for someone who aligns with these values and wants to grow long-term with us.



Benefits

• Salary: USD $1,000 – $1,250 per month (based on experience)

• After 90 days, you become eligible for:

• Paid HMO

• 15 days Paid Time Off (PTO)

• Paid U.S. holidays

• Monthly rice subsidy



How to Apply

Please provide::

1. A resume 

2. A video recording describing your experience supporting a CEO or executive and examples of systems, automation, or organization improvements you’ve handled

title: Acquisition Agent
description:
Acquisition Agent – Residential Real Estate



Company: Alpha Cash Buyers

Location: Dallas, TX

Reports To: Director of Acquisitions & Sales



Position Overview



At Alpha Cash Buyers, our mission is to help homeowners solve real problems while acquiring off-market residential properties that strengthen communities and fuel company growth. We operate with a people-first, performance-driven mindset and are guided by our core values: Can-Do Attitude, Coachability, Play to Win, Care Hard, and Personal Development.



We are seeking a high-performing Acquisition Agent who excels in face-to-face conversations, negotiations, and relationship-building with motivated sellers. This role is focused on meeting with homeowners, understanding their situations, presenting solutions, and securing signed purchase agreements that align with our investment criteria.



You will be provided warm, pre-qualified leads, a proven sales process, and strong team support. If you thrive in emotionally intelligent sales, enjoy solving problems, and are driven by results, this role offers significant income potential and long-term growth.



Key ResponsibilitiesSeller Engagement & Appointments



Attend daily seller appointments (in-person or virtual) scheduled by the inside sales team.

Build trust and rapport through empathetic, solution-oriented conversations.

Gather detailed information on property condition, seller motivation, financial situation, and timeline.

Conduct property walkthroughs, take photos, and document property details accurately.

Offer Creation & Negotiation



Collaborate with the Acquisitions and Operations teams to determine pricing and offer strategy.

Present offers clearly and confidently, addressing objections and guiding sellers toward win-win outcomes.

Negotiate terms and secure signed purchase agreements.

Submit all contracts and documentation accurately and on time.

Maintain consistent, professional communication with sellers throughout the contract process.

Pipeline Management & Team Collaboration



Maintain accurate and up-to-date records in the CRM (Salesforce or equivalent).

Follow up consistently with sellers to maximize contract conversion.

Work closely with the Transaction Coordinator and Dispositions teams to ensure smooth closings.

Participate in weekly meetings, training sessions, roleplay, and performance reviews.

QualificationsRequired Experience



1+ year of experience in sales, customer service, negotiations, or a relationship-based role.

Experience in residential real estate, acquisitions, or investment sales is a plus but not required.

Skills & Competencies



Strong verbal and interpersonal communication skills.

High emotional intelligence with a people-first mindset.

Confident negotiator who can handle pricing discussions and objections.

Organized and detail-oriented with strong follow-through.

Comfortable using CRM systems, Google Workspace, and mobile sales tools.

Valid driver’s license and reliable transportation for in-person appointments.

Mindset & Cultural Fit



At Alpha Cash Buyers, results matter—but how we achieve them matters more. You’ll thrive here if you align with the following:



Can-Do Attitude



You approach challenges with urgency, resilience, and optimism.

You take ownership and find solutions rather than excuses.

Coachable Spirit



You seek feedback, apply coaching, and continuously refine your skills.

You are humble, hungry, and growth-oriented.

Play to Win



You are competitive, goal-driven, and motivated by performance-based income.

You manage your time effectively and hold yourself accountable.

Care Hard



You treat homeowners with respect, empathy, and professionalism.

You value integrity and doing the right thing—every time.

Personal Development Focus



You view this role as a platform for personal and professional growth.

You are committed to improving your communication, mindset, and leadership skills.

This Role Is NOT a Fit If:



You avoid difficult or high-stakes conversations about money.

You require constant supervision or reminders to follow through.

You are resistant to coaching, accountability, or performance expectations.

You dislike fast-paced, emotionally charged sales environments.

What We OfferCompensation & Rewards



Competitive base salary plus uncapped commission and bonuses.

Monthly and quarterly incentives for top producers.

Growth & Development



Industry-leading sales training, mentorship, and weekly coaching.

Clear advancement path to Senior Acquisition Agent, Team Lead, or Sales Leadership.

Ongoing skill development through roleplay, feedback, and deal collaboration.

Work Environment



High-energy, team-oriented sales culture.

Strong leadership, accountability, and support.

Daily opportunities to make a meaningful impact on homeowners and communities.

Impact & Legacy



Be the first point of contact in helping families navigate challenging transitions.

Acquire properties that drive company growth and neighborhood revitalization.

How to Apply



If you are a confident, caring, and coachable communicator who enjoys solving problems and closing deals, we’d love to hear from you.



Submit your resume along with a brief message explaining why you’d be a great fit for the Acquisition Agent role at Alpha Cash Buyers.

title: Operations Manager and Integrator, From Craft to Cash®
description:

This is not a virtual assistant position. This is an execution leadership role. You will work directly with the CEO to ensure launches, projects, events, systems, and team responsibilities are executed smoothly and on schedule.



If you love organization, accountability, systems, and helping a business run efficiently, this role is for you.



If you prefer simple task-based VA work, this role is not a fit.

Online courses and memberships

Project Management

Ensuring projects move forward without CEO involvement

mbers

SUCCESS IN THIS ROLE

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

2. The word “EXECUTION” at the top of your application, so we know you read this.

Applications that do not follow instructions will not be reviewed. We will extend interview opportunities to candidates who are a great fit.
